(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)

From the brand

KERNOWO LED LIGHTS

All lights what you need

KERNOWO is a professional brand company focusing on home indoor lighting and outdoor lighting.

We are committed to providing customers with high-quality products that are convenient and energy-saving.

You will find many types LED lights you want.

Solar Lights with Remote

106 Solar Lights Outdoor with Independent Solar Panel 2 Pack

Solar Lights Outdoor

Super bright outside solar flood light, perfect for your outdoor use.

KERNOWO led lights

【Four Modes Adjustable】Four adjustable modes by pressing the button on the back of the solar outdoor light and the remote. Mode 1: Auto on at night, and motion sensor off. Mode 2: Strong light of 15s when motion is detected, and low light after people leave. Mode 3: Strong light of 15s when motion is detected, and turn off after people leave. Mode 4: Light fashes at night.
【Flexible Use】The solar panel of the solar led lights can be placed independently of the light body, and connected by a 16.5 ft wire to ensure maximum charging. Aslo you can put them together.
【Super Bright Light Beads】Equiped with 106 LED high light beads and an illumination of 180° wide, the solar lights outdoor can provide 500sq.ft and 3000LM lighting. 3000mAh lithium battery has a larger capacity to provide more efficient charging and more lasting lighting.
【Weatherproof & Durable】Built with IP65 Waterproof,the solar panel lights outdoor body is sturdy enough and the wire connection is sealed.It still works well in rainy and cold days and hot summer.




Specification:

  • Quantity: 2 Pack
  • LED Beads: 106 Pcs
  • Brightness: 3000LM
  • Battery Capacity: 3000mAh
  • Material: ABS+PC
  • Waterproof Level: IP65

Solar Wall Lights Outdoor

luces solares para exteriores

1.106 LED 3000LM light gives you super brightness.

2.Independent solar panel gives you more flexible installation.

3.With remote included, you can control the light more conveniently.

4.IP65 waterproof design makes it withstand bad wheather for more durability.

Read more




Large Lighting and Sensoring Range

Solar Motion Sensor Light has 180° wide lighting angle.And large sensoring range of 26.2ft and 120° sensoring angle make you not lose your steps in the dark.

IP65 Waterproof

With IP65 waterproof , solar wall light can be outdoor used. No worry about rainy and cold days.

135° Rotatable Light Head

The light head and solar panel can be 135° adjusted,which means it can charge more effectively and cover more range.

Read more




4

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:01:52 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Use Upgraded Solar Panel

Our solar security lights equipped with newest monocrystalline silicon solar panel,up to 25% conversion rate,which can shorten the charging time. built in large capacity 2400 mah rechargeable battery,ensure Longer lighting time.

With Remote Control

Solar powered lights comes with a remote controller,you can turn on/off the light and select different modes by remote control without having to climb up on a ladder(NOTE: please take out the clear insulation sheet first when you use the remote control)

Weatherproof & Durable

Crafted from corrosion resistant ABS plastic and protected by the IP65 waterproof, The lifespan of light will be up to 50,000hours. you can install solar flood lights anywhere as you like, such as gardens, pergola, terraces, driveways, gates,backyard etc

Super Bright Lighting

Solar motion sensor lights equipped with 300 super bright LED light beads,It can produce up to 3000lm 7000K brightness, suitable as security lighting for your home.

5 Rotatable Lighting Heads

Solar wall lights has 5 swiveling lighting heads,the adjustable lamp cap can freely move up and down, left and right,which can meet various angles of irradiation.

Easy Setup

The solar led outdoor lights are easy installation, no annoying wires connect or adapters,only using the included screws to fix on any exterior & interior wall or all types of material including metal, wood or plastic.

2023 Newest Solar Lights For Outside Inside House – Super Bright LED Motion Detection Floodlights with 5 Lighting Heads

Warm Tips

1. When the solar panel is unplugged from the solar lamp; lighting mode 1,mode 2, mode 3 and mode 4 can work both at day and night.

2. When the solar panel is plugged into the solar lamp; lighting mode 1,mode 2 and mode 3 only works at night, the mode 4 can work both at day and night.

Note:

1. Please turn the solar motion sensing lights power switch to the “ON” position before first time using. then press the gear switch or use remote control to adjust the lighting mode.

2. The angle and direction of motion sensor should be adjusted to the best position, so that motion detecting lights has the largest detection range and the recommended height is 6-11 feet.

Upgraded 4 Lighting Modes: solar motion activated light has 4 lighting modes: Mode 1: the light turn on for 20s when detected movement at night. Mode 2: light turns on in dim mode at night, get brighter for 20s when detected movement. Mode 3: the light will always turn on and stay medium light at night with or without detecting motion. Mode 4: light turns on for 20 seconds when detects movements both in daytime and night.
Innovative 5 Lighting Heads Design: our solar wall lamps is equipped with 5 rotating lighting heads and pivoting solar panels,it can move up and down, left and right, easily adjust the lamp cap,solar panel and motion sensor to any angles as your requirement,up to 360° wide lighting angle,bring you a fantastic lighting experience.
Ultra Bright with 300LED Solar Power Lights: with 300 super bright LED light beads,It can produce up to 3000lm 7000K high brightness output,which can fully achieve the brightness required by daily life. equipped with upgraded PIR motion sensor, solar spot lights can detect up to 120 degree with a longer sensor length of 28feet,motion detection solar lights can sense people,animal,cars etc.
All Weather Resistant: solar garden lights is made of durable high-strength ABS material,reaching IP65 waterproof level,which can withstand many kinds of extreme weather, such as snow, frost,rain and high temperature etc,great led exterior flood lights for fence, balcony, pathway, patio,porch,deck,street,stairs,steps,yard etc





Use Upgraded Solar Panel

Our solar security lights equipped with newest monocrystalline silicon solar panel,up to 25% conversion rate,which can shorten the charging time. built in large capacity 2400 mah rechargeable battery,ensure Longer lighting time.

With Remote Control

Solar powered lights comes with a remote controller,you can turn on/off the light and select different modes by remote control without having to climb up on a ladder(NOTE: please take out the clear insulation sheet first when you use the remote control)

Weatherproof & Durable

Crafted from corrosion resistant ABS plastic and protected by the IP65 waterproof, The lifespan of light will be up to 50,000hours. you can install solar flood lights anywhere as you like, such as gardens, pergola, terraces, driveways, gates,backyard etc

Warm Tips

2. When the solar panel is plugged into the solar lamp; lighting mode 1,mode 2 and mode 3 only works at night, the mode 4 can work both at day and night.

Note:

1. Please turn the solar motion sensing lights power switch to the “ON” position before first time using. then press the gear switch or use remote control to adjust the lighting mode.

2. The angle and direction of motion sensor should be adjusted to the best position, so that motion detecting lights has the largest detection range and the recommended height is 6-11 feet.

Warranty & Support

Price: $36.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:11 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Peasur 138 LED Solar Lights Outdoor

Solar light has motion smart sensor, which can detect motion sensitively. Use the sun to charge during the day and automatically light up at night. It is ideal for night lighting of pathways, driveways, gardens, hallways, patios, etc.Our solar security light has 3 modes to choose from, you can choose different modes according to your needs.MODE 1.[ Constant light mode]: Auto power on at night, auto power off during the day.This mode can be on for 5-8 hours.MODE 2.[Dim light sensor mode]：Low brightness no motion,full brightness when the motion is detected.Detection time is about 20 seconds.MODE 3.[Sensor light mode]: Full brightness when the motion is detected,close when no motion.(Recommended to use.)Detection time is about 20 seconds.

Warm Tip:

You need to install the solar panel in a place where the sun can shine, and the charging effect will be better when the switch is turned on.Please install the solar panel in a place where the sun can shine, the best installation height is 2-3 meters, the sensor is the most sensitive.If you need to open it during the day, you need to cover the solar panel to light up.The first time you use it, you need to tear off the plastic film on the surface of the solar panel and expose them to more than 8 hours.

Product Details

Battery: 1200 mAh LED Quantity: 138 LED Lighting Angle: 180° Detection angle: 120 ° Waterproof level: IP65 Ideal installation height: 2-3 meters Material: ABS plastic Sensor range: within 6-8 meters Charging time: 8-12 hours Use time: Full power always bright for 6 hours, slightly bright 8-10 hours Package contains: 6 *Pack 138 LED Solar Outdoor Lights 6* Screws and 6* Wall Plugs 1*User Manual

Waterproof Design

Our solar lights are waterproof design, so you don’t need to worry about the weather, you can safely use it in outdoor courtyards, corridors, fence, gardens and other places.

High-efficiency Solar Panel

Using monocrystalline silicon solar panel design, the conversion rate of the solar lamp is increased from 20% to 22%, the charging speed is faster during the day, and the lighting time at night can last longer.

Brighter & Larger Coverage Lighting

180° wide-angle lighting provides excellent brightness and greater lighting coverage. It can provide you and your family with a safer and more comfortable environment.

Power
Solar Powreded Solar Powreded Solar Powreded

LED
138 LED 138 LED 138 LED

Pack
6 Pack 8 Pack 10 Pack

【3 Lighting Modes & Motion Sensor】 Solar lights have a built-in sensitive PIR motion sensor, which can easily capture motion. There are 3 modes:1.[ Constant light mode]: auto power on at night, auto power off during the day.2.[Dim light sensor mode]:low brightness no motion,full brightness when the motion is detected 3.[Sensor light mode]: full brightness when the motion is detected,close when no motion(Mode 3 is most energy-saving, extend battery life, it is recommended to use).
【Waterproof & Energy Saving】The solar panel is made of high quality durable ABS material with covered LED protection screen. Even in rainy or bad weather, it can effectively isolate rainwater and can be used outdoors. Absorb sunlight during the day to convert solar energy into electricity, and at night into light to illuminate your yard or road. Green energy not only protects the environment, but also saves electricity bills.
【Easy to Install and Widely Use】Solar front door lights are easy to install, they don’t need wiring, you can install using the provided screws. Can be used in areas without power, great for outdoors, walls, gardens, patios, decks, garages, driveways, porches, fences, gutters, RVs, and more.
【High-efficiency Solar Panel】The solar energy conversion rate of the solar wall lamp is increased from 20% to 22%, the charging speed is faster during the day, and the lighting time at night can last longer.
【Valuable Customer Service】 60-day Money Back Guarantee, 1-year Worry-free Guarantee, 24-hour Friendly Customer Service.If you have any questions or concerns during this process, you can contact us via email at any time, we will do our best to solve the problem for you.


Peasur 138 LED Solar Lights Outdoor

  • Solar light has motion smart sensor, which can detect motion sensitively. Use the sun to charge during the day and automatically light up at night. It is ideal for night lighting of pathways, driveways, gardens, hallways, patios, etc.Our solar security light has 3 modes to choose from, you can choose different modes according to your needs.
  • MODE 1.[ Constant light mode]: Auto power on at night, auto power off during the day.This mode can be on for 5-8 hours.
  • MODE 2.[Dim light sensor mode]：Low brightness no motion,full brightness when the motion is detected.Detection time is about 20 seconds.
  • MODE 3.[Sensor light mode]: Full brightness when the motion is detected,close when no motion.(Recommended to use.)Detection time is about 20 seconds.

Warm Tip:

  • You need to install the solar panel in a place where the sun can shine, and the charging effect will be better when the switch is turned on.
  • Please install the solar panel in a place where the sun can shine, the best installation height is 2-3 meters, the sensor is the most sensitive.
  • If you need to open it during the day, you need to cover the solar panel to light up.
  • The first time you use it, you need to tear off the plastic film on the surface of the solar panel and expose them to more than 8 hours.

LED Quantity: 138 LED
Lighting Angle: 180°
Detection angle: 120 °
Waterproof level: IP65
Ideal installation height: 2-3 meters
Material: ABS plastic
Sensor range: within 6-8 meters
Charging time: 8-12 hours
Use time: Full power always bright for 6 hours, slightly bright 8-10 hours

High-efficiency Solar Panel

Brighter & Larger Coverage Lighting

  • 180° wide-angle lighting provides excellent brightness and greater lighting coverage. It can provide you and your family with a safer and more comfortable environment.

Product Description

Easy Set Up for Outdoor & Indoor Lighting

Warm Tips:

The recommended installation height is 6.56ft-13.12ft, the best installation height is 8ft-9ft.If you want to install security camera on the opposite side of the battery lights, please avoid infrared directly irradiated or reflection on the sensor.Make sure batteries are inserted correctly before you test activation.It is Battery Powered, NOT Solar Powered, NOT AC Power Hardwired.Note: Please allow 1% failure rate of the outdoor motion light due to the long distance of transport maybe cause damage or accessories lost. Just find us for a replacement if there is something wrong or get your spend back if it doesn’t meet your need.

Security Lights Features:

Wattage: 4.5WLumens: 480LM(whole light fixture)Color Temperature: 5500K-6500KSensing Angle: 180degreeDetection Distance: 30-35 feetLifespan: 50,000 Hours+Voltage: 6VBattery: (4 D-cell batteries per light, not included)light coverage: 500 square footWaterproof: IP65

TOOWELL Battery Operated Outdoor Flood Lights

Instant Convenience with Motion Detector Lights

Installation instructions：

1. Use a flat head screwdriver to remove the Mounting Plate

2. Insert 4 D-cell Batteries and revert the battery lid

3. Mark the fixed position and fix the mounting plate on the wall

4. Line up the light with the mounting plate and slide the light into grooves

Package Contents:

1 x PIR LED Outdoor Motion Sensor Light

1 x User Manual

4 screws and 4 anchors

Outdoor Battery Operated Lights (NOT Solar Powered)

Friendly Motion Sensor Light Mode: With an advanced sensitive photocell sensor, the battery powered Led flood light will be activated and stay on for the 20s (when the ambient light is lower than 15LUX). Stay off at the daytime(only sensing motion in darkness). Auto LED motion detection security light like a steward ensures safety for children,pets,and the old from dusk to dawn.
Save Money on an Electrician: Outdoor battery operated floodlight adopt wireless wall-mounted design,Easy to install this outdoor lights for house and yard in minutes–No main power or wiring or professional electrician required.Where sunlight and electricity can’t reach, TOOWELL battery operated outdoor lights can light up.
Customized Your Beam Angle：Adjustable angle brings flexible light to your home. Battery powered spotlights Dual head support 135°up to down,180°side to side pivot, customized led spot lights coverage area around the house.
Efficient Battery Powered Outdoor Light: LED units output 4.5w,480lumen,5500K(daylight white), equivalent to 50W halogen light, a brand new set of 4*D batteries standby time up to 180 days. saving your electricity bill by up to 80%.
Sensitive and Durable：Battery powered Security light with upgrade technic motion sensor can be triggered by the moving human, cars, or animals up to 30 feet sensing range at 180°motion detection angle. When motion caught, it lighting.
3 Years Warranty：Based on its reliable and durable performance,we offer 3-year warranty while others are just 1 year，customer service team provides 7*24 hrs help, and your satisfaction is 100% guaranteed. You don’t need to send the prdoduct back if TOOWELL product did not meet your expectation,Please contact us and get your money back.

Easy Set Up for Outdoor & Indoor Lighting

Warm Tips:

  • The recommended installation height is 6.56ft-13.12ft, the best installation height is 8ft-9ft.
  • If you want to install security camera on the opposite side of the battery lights, please avoid infrared directly irradiated or reflection on the sensor.
  • Make sure batteries are inserted correctly before you test activation.
  • It is Battery Powered, NOT Solar Powered, NOT AC Power Hardwired.
  • Note: Please allow 1% failure rate of the outdoor motion light due to the long distance of transport maybe cause damage or accessories lost. Just find us for a replacement if there is something wrong or get your spend back if it doesn’t meet your need.

Manufacturer Wyze
Country of Origin China

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $35.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:20:42 UTC – Details)


Cam v3 is the 3rd generation of Wyze’s flagship camera, Wyze Cam. Like its predecessor Wyze Cam v3 lets you see and record 1080p video right from the Wyze mobile app. New to Wyze Cam v3 is its waterproof design allowing for outdoor installation with an IP65 rating. Wyze Cam v3 also takes advantage of an all-new Starlight Sensor which allows for extreme low-light performance and shows great detail in the dark. With Wyze Cam v3’s color night viewing, night time video recording appears as if it’s day time.
Color night vision: An all-new Starlight Sensor records night time video in full, vivid color. The Starlight Sensor can see full color in environments up to 25x darker than traditional video cameras and the new f/1.6 aperture captures 2x more light.
Indoor/Outdoor: Wyze Cam v3 is a wired video camera with an IP65 rating so you can confidently install it outside in the rain or inside in the kids’ room. Wyze Outdoor Power Adapter (sold separately) required for outdoor use. Phone Compatibility – Android 5.0+, iOS 9.0+.
Motion & Sound detection: Wyze Cam records video when motion or sound is detected and sends an alert straight to your phone. Motion Detection Zones and custom settings allow you to adjust the sensitivity of detection or turn it off completely.
24/7 Continuous Recording: Continuous video recording with a 32GB MicroSD card (sold separately). Just insert the MicroSD into the base of the Wyze Cam and you’re all set.
IFTTT certified connect all of your different apps and devices. When you sign up for a free account, you can enable your apps and devices to work together.


Color Night Vision

Experience the all-new Starlight Sensor.

IP65 Weather Resistance

Use it indoors & outdoors.

Product Description

2 Pack Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights Battery Powered

Motion Sensor + Light Sensor: In the dark, the light will automatically light up when it senses motion within 16ft(5m). High Brightness: 600LM 6000K white light ensures high brightness lighting in the dark. 360° Adjustable: The light head can be rotated 360 °, you can freely adjust it to the angle you need during installation. Battery Powered: The motion sensor outdoor light is powered by 4 D-cell batteries (not included) and is not charged by wires.

LED Motion Lights Outdoor

Super Bright LED Sensor Light

This motion sensor light has 4 high power LED with 6000K white light. In the outdoor or indoor dark environment, the extremely high brightness of 600LM provides you with perfect lighting.

360° Adjustable Security Light

Our outdoor security light head can be rotated 360°, so you can freely adjust the angle according to your needs.

Outdoor Spotlight Waterproof

The IP65 waterproof spotlight is perfect for outdoor use, and the product material is rust-proof and durable with ABS plastic.

Motion Detector Lights for Outside and Indoor Use

Front door lights

At night, when you come home, the sensor light will turn on automatically, you can open the door more quickly and conveniently.

Garage lights

Garage outdoor security lights to help you see the road better and park easier.

Storage room lights

When you are storing items in a closed storage room, our motion sensor lights can provide you with good lighting.

Stairs lights

This motion sensor light is also suitable for stairs and hallways, so you will not stumble in the dark.

【PIR Sensor Motion Detection】In darkness or at night, the motion sensor lights automatically light up when detect motion within 16 feet (5m). After 30 seconds of no motion detected, the light will automatically turn off.
【Multi-Angle Adjustment】Our outdoor security light head can be rotated 360°, the light base can be swung back and forth 180°, you can freely adjust the angle according to your needs.
【Waterproof and Durable】IP65 waterproof, the material is rust-proof and durable ABS plastic. It provides you with perfect lighting outdoors in rain and snow.
【Battery Powered & Easy Installation】The battery operated outdoor lights powered by 4 D-cell batteries (not included), and the base is fixed to the wall with the included 4 mounting screws.

2 Pack Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights Battery Powered

  • Motion Sensor + Light Sensor: In the dark, the light will automatically light up when it senses motion within 16ft(5m).
  • High Brightness: 600LM 6000K white light ensures high brightness lighting in the dark.
  • 360° Adjustable: The light head can be rotated 360 °, you can freely adjust it to the angle you need during installation.
  • Battery Powered: The motion sensor outdoor light is powered by 4 D-cell batteries (not included) and is not charged by wires.

Wyze Cam Floodlight combines the award-winning surveillance power of Wyze Cam v3 with the deterrence of an ultra-bright motion floodlight, for the ultimate in home security. Get all the intrusion deterring power of 2600 combined lumens and 270 degrees of customizable motion detection, supplemented with the video surveillance, night vision, siren, and smart automations of a Wyze Cam. Affordable, smart home security, with additional safety features available through an optional Cam Plus subscription.
Two super bright, adjustable LEDs for a combined 2600 lumens of light, and a handy dimming option where less brightness is desired.
Three individually controlled PIR sensors provide for 270 degrees of customizable motion detection. Range and sensitivity are adjustable up to 30 feet.
Built in Wyze Cam v3 provides sound detection, as well as artificial intelligence and the ability to identify and record motion, with or without the floodlight, in 1080p Full HD with Starlight Sensor color night vision.
Dusk to Dawn automation. Wyze Cam Floodlight knows when the sun is down and when it’s up. No need to turn the floodlight on or off once it’s connected.

270˚ Motion-Activated Floodlights

Three PIR sensors and 270 degrees of customizable detection

Enhanced Two-way Audio

Beyond motion detection. Full, two-way interaction.

2600 Lumen Super Bright LED

Illuminate the good motion and deter the bad

IP65 Rating Weather Resistant

Rugged construction for year-round, all-weather surveillance

Extra USB Power Port

Double your coverage with an extra Wyze Cam v3

Wireless Mini WiFi Camera
A Great Choice for all of Your Surveillance Needs.
Home Security in Your Hands Whenever you’re using a smartphone/computer device, you can view the HD live streaming by camera’s APP.
You can easy to operate mini camera. Just insert a micro sd card and turn on.
You can put the camera in the corner of home,office, warehouse, store,backyard, garden, even in your pocket or on your collar with a strong
Specifications:
Color: Black
Resolution Ratio: 1080P / 720P
Video Format: ASF
Visual Angle: 150 degree
Camera Shooting:Straight line 6 –10meters
Recording time: more than 1 hour

APP Support: Android / iOS

WiFi Wireless Camera*1

【2.4GHZ WiFi Connection】: This mini camera is only 2.4GHZ. Keep an eye on your house, office or family as a housekeeper or nanny cam 24hours/7days.
【Security camera】: Our camera has a round and compact design, making it very suitable as a home security camera. With camera , you can put the miniature camera in the corner of a house, warehouse, backyard, shop, office, etc.
【Stable performance】As long as it is used in a normal natural environment, the receiving signal is stable and the battery is sufficient, it can last for a long time. It has a built-in lithium battery with extremely high safety performance and can work continuously for 60 minutes.
【WiFi Connection Function】 With Wifi connectivity to room’s router, you can watch live video feed or playbacks no matter where you are by accessing the APP(The app never charges)
